EmailTemplate.subject: Remember The Last Time You Cleaned Your Desk?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
View Online <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> Nothing Beats The Power Of Good Cleaning Products <[[http://www.grandandtoy.com/dcr/sites/core/Gtblog-essential-cleaning-products.aspx?cmp=EBBDCLEARANCEEN&utm_source={{my.UTM%20Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> How often do you actually clean your desk at work? If your answer is ‘not often’ then check out these tips on essential cleaning products for your workspace. Get Cleaning <[[http://www.grandandtoy.com/dcr/sites/core/Gtblog-essential-cleaning-products.aspx?cmp=EBBDCLEARANCEEN&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> Save on cleaning essentials this season. Get 15% OFF when you spend $75 or more. Use code 1906SAVE at check out. Shop Now <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/sites/core/default.aspx?cmp=EBBSCLEANINGEN&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> Customer Service <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/sites/core/contact-us.aspx?cmp=EBCUSTOMERCARE2018EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}]]> | Terms & Conditions <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/sites/core/terms-and-conditions.aspx?cmp=EBTERMS2018EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}]]> | Privacy Policy <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/sites/core/privacy-policy.aspx?cmp=EBPRIVACY2018EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}]]> Grand & Toy | 200 Aviva Park Drive, Vaughan, ON L4L9C7 | 1-866-391-8111
*Free Shipping applies to orders of $50 or more. Minimum purchase required before taxes and after discounts. Orders outside our local delivery area, oversized and special order items do not qualify. Non-qualifying orders incur a shipping charge based on order size, weight and delivery location (minimum charge of $9.95). Other restrictions apply. See grandandtoy.com/terms <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/terms?cmp=EBSHIPPINGSEPT17EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}]]> or call 1-866-391-8111 for details.
**Must sign in to your account in order to use the promo code. Offer valid at www.grandandtoy.com only. Enter promo code 1906SAVE at checkout. Not valid on special furniture orders. Void if copied, sold, purchased, transferred, taxed or where prohibited. Cannot be combined with any other coupon, associate discount, or any other offers. Offer not valid on prior purchases or for credit card payments. No cash or credit back. Open to Canadian residents only. Cash value .001¢. Offer expires June 30, 2019.
